item.title: Kata: Mars Rover in Clojure
item.description: Yesterday at the clojure meetup we1 did the mars rover in clojure and today I’ve tried my hand at it again. Original, from the three of us here and my results here Jorge Ávila, Jesús Díez and I ↩︎
